name: npm_link_local_subtrees_in_heroku
description: An example node project that uses git subtrees for private modules and attempts to link or install locally these modules in heroku.

scripts.preinstall: cd local_subtree_modules/test_private_hapi_plugin && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link test_private_hapi_plugin && cd local_subtree_modules/test_private_library && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link test_private_library
scripts.preupdate: cd local_subtree_modules/test_private_hapi_plugin && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link test_private_hapi_plugin && cd local_subtree_modules/test_private_library && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link test_private_library

author: Joshua Ball <joshua.g.s.ball@gmail.com> (https://github.com/joshball/)
